import{USER_LOGIN,USER_LOGOUT,GET_STUDENT_PERSONAL_INFO,SET_STUDENT_AS_USER,GET_STUDENT_LIST,UPDATE_STUDENT_INFO,GET_HEADER_COUNT,UPDATE_HEADER_COUNT,CHANGE_PASSWORD_STATUS,REMOVE_STUDENT_DATA,UPDATE_USER_PERSONAL_INFO,UPDATE_PARENT_PERSONAL_INFO,UPDATE_FEED_GROUP_INFO,GROUP_LIST_DATA}from'../types';import theRapidHireApiService from'../../api/apiService';export var actionUserLogin=function actionUserLogin(data){var request=theRapidHireApiService('login',data);return{type:USER_LOGIN,payload:request};};export var actionUserLogout=function actionUserLogout(){var request=theRapidHireApiService('logout');return{type:USER_LOGOUT,payload:request};};export var actionGetStudentPersonalInfo=function actionGetStudentPersonalInfo(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('getStudentPersonalInfo',{userId:userId});return{type:GET_STUDENT_PERSONAL_INFO,payload:request};};export var actionSetStudentAsUser=function actionSetStudentAsUser(data){return{type:SET_STUDENT_AS_USER,payload:{otherUserInfoData:data.otherUserInfoData}};};export var actionGetStudentList=function actionGetStudentList(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('getStudentsByParentProfile',{userId:userId});return{type:GET_STUDENT_LIST,payload:request};};export var actionGetStudentUpdatedInfo=function actionGetStudentUpdatedInfo(data){var request=data;return{type:UPDATE_STUDENT_INFO,payload:request};};export var actionGetHeaderCount=function actionGetHeaderCount(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('getHeaderCount',{userId:userId});return{type:GET_HEADER_COUNT,payload:request};};export var actionUpdateHeaderCount=function actionUpdateHeaderCount(data){var request=theRapidHireApiService('updateHeaderCount',data);return{type:UPDATE_HEADER_COUNT,payload:data};};export var actionChangePasswordStatus=function actionChangePasswordStatus(){return{type:CHANGE_PASSWORD_STATUS};};export var actionRemoveStudent=function actionRemoveStudent(data){return{type:REMOVE_STUDENT_DATA,payload:data};};export var actionUpdateUserInfo=function actionUpdateUserInfo(data){var request=data;return{type:UPDATE_USER_PERSONAL_INFO,payload:request};};export var actionUpdateGroupInfo=function request=theRapidHireApiService('getGroupListByUser',userId);return{type:GROUP_LIST_DATA,payload:request};};export var actionUpdateParentInfo=function actionUpdateParentInfo(data){var request=data;return{type:UPDATE_PARENT_PERSONAL_INFO,payload:request};};
